greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of c(q) * c(q^6) / c(q^2)^2 in powers of q where c() is a cubic AGM theta function.
comment: Cubic AGM theta functions: a(q) (see A004016), b(q) (A005928), c(q) (A005882).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: Expansion of eta(q^2)^2 * eta(q^3)^3 * eta(q^18)^3 / (eta(q) * eta(q^6)^7) in powers of q.
Convolution inverse is A182033. - _Michael Somos_, Feb 19 2015
program: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<1, 0, n--; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^2 * eta(x^3 + A)^3 * eta(x^18 + A)^3 / (eta(x + A) * eta(x^6 + A)^7), n))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 12 2006
